oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Uroleucon formosanum (Takahashi) and Uroleucon sonchellum (Monell) (Hemiptera, Aphididae): Morphological Comparison and Diagnosis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pike, K S
Foottit, R G
Miller, R H
Idechiil, O
Allison, D W
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: descriptions
insect morphology

Aphidoidea

East Asia
Mariana Islands
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Uroleucon formosanum (Takahashi) and U. sonchellum (Monell) (Hemiptera: Aphididae: Aphidinae: Macrosiphini) are species of very similar morphology. Descriptions, illustrations, morphological measurements and a diagnosis are provided.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Pike KS, Foottit RG, Miller RH, Idechiil O, Allison DW. 2005. Uroleucon formosanum (Takahashi) and Uroleucon sonchellum (Monell) (Hemiptera, Aphididae): morphological comparison and diagnosis. Proc Hawaiian Entomol Soc 37:49â€“63.
